component.name: TortoiseHg
component.summary: TortoiseHg is a set of graphical tools and a shell extension for the Mercurial distributed revision control system.

description.p: TortoiseHg is a Windows shell extension and a series of applications for the Mercurial distributed revision control system. It also includes a Gnome/Nautilus extension and a CLI wrapper application so the TortoiseHg tools can be used on non-Windows platforms.
